summary: Varda films and interviews gleaners in France in all forms, from those picking fields after the harvest to those scouring the dumpsters of Paris.
cast: Jean La Planche|Bodan Litnanski|Agnès Varda|François Wertheimer
keywords: travelogue|1990s|france|reference to jean francois millet|reference to famous painting
title: Los espigadores y la espigadora
